Review.Contenu: My Company, P Point Market has purchased kitchen equipment from A City Discount (03/25/2019)The store instead of placing a balance back in our credit card, placed a IS Credit ($3,798.00).When the issue was found, I contacted ACity to get the balance back into my account.  A City Discount said that because it is an old account they can't do the reimbursement.  We think this is an abuse and at least they could give us an opportunity to get some merchandise. Very bad for this company.  Please advise how to handle this type of abuse

Review.Titre: I have used this company for well over…
Review.Contenu: I have used this company for well over $10,000.00 worth of business. You would think that a $50.00 dispute would have been resolved in a more timely manner but it took over a month. I ordered a lift gate for delivery, but the driver didn't use it. I have video and pictures documented and sent to ACityDiscount. However, ACityDiscount said the driver was disputing my word so they would not give me the refund, without more investigation. It wasn't until started calling twice a week did I get to speak to a manager, Summer. She was extremely rude and curt. Larry and Brian were always very pleasant when I talked with them, (many times I might add) but they were unable to resolve the issue without me going over their heads. A little kindness goes a long way. Unfortunately Summer will have me looking elsewhere in the future.

0rdered $2,500 of four different types of chairs, salesperson told me that they dont have those no more and they keep them listed on there website to get people to call them. I feel this company is a scam.

DON'T BUY FROM THESE PEOPLE!I ordered a simple metal lifter/handle for deep dish pizza pans.  I received it in a box that was big enough to hold a motorcycle helmet and the lifter was so flimsy and poorly made that I wouldn't trust it to pick up anything hot or otherwise.  Okay, so I wrote them a note saying I wanted to return it and they said that they would have to get a return authorization from THEIR supplier first and then I would have to pay return postage to both them AND their supplier.  HAH!

Ordered a TMGM36 Griddle 7/30/21 it was back ordered finally received 10/18/21.  All the accessories were missing. Legs, Drip Pan regulator, and orifices for LP gas. Talked to a someone about this and was sent the legs, drip pan and one of three orifices. Still missing the regulator and two of the orifices. talked to them again and have had no responce

Horrible....I got a lot of stuffs in this space.But I realized that I got over size sandwiches prep cooler and griddle. So, I try to return it.They told me they will charge 25% from my prep cooler and griddle....OMG....Even I did not used it.......I could not trust that......I decided to do re-sell it. That's better for me.I got Horrible Experiences.I ask them show me return policy ,they said do not have return policy.....omg

Review.Titre: I bought a imperial 6 burner stove
Review.Contenu: I bought a imperial 6 burner stove. I still haven’t recieved the screws for the wheels. The oven was way off temperature wise and the calibration was not covered under warranty so it cost me another $350. Burners don’t work well.  Imperial says pulling 7 amps when it is suppose to pull 12 per burner is “ok my man” to the tech.  Service department does not help at all.  Wanted to return the stove and they won’t take it back. Don’t buy from them it has been horrible

Review.Titre: If you like being ripped off, buy from ACity!
Review.Contenu: We ordered an item from ACity that showed up in horrible condition.  It was a Hobart Vertical Cutter-Mixer.  It was missing key components and was in general disrepair.  Upon requesting service from the company, they gave us the runaround, and finally told us the problems were our fault, and we had not other options.  If you like poor customers service, poor products, and an overall bad experience, shop ACityDiscount!!

Review.Titre: This place is the worst of worst on…
Review.Contenu: This place is the worst of worst on customer service - I bought a piece of equipment and asked them for help and I will even pay - but no not until leave message with manager and he will get back with you next am - did he NO - I have been chasing done parts so I can open

Review.Titre: I appreciate giving me the lowest price…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate giving me the lowest price possible, even less than the web price. The salesman was very easygoing and helpful. The blender jar came quickly and is just what I wanted.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Never shipped my order! Wants me to file claim on a shipment UPS never received!
Review.Contenu: They want me to file a claim with UPS on a shipment in which their tracking number showsUPS Never receiving! Avoid! Ripe Off! Horrible Customer service! 1Z246AT94253709328

Since last post they contacted me but now it has been over 10 days and nothing is being done.  Not only that, now they refuse to answer their phones!  Left several msgs and got nothing back! Leaving me out to dry I guess. You buy a new item that states it has the "best warranty in the business" you would expect to be able to use that warranty, but apparently not for me.  They left an answer saying they provide 5star service but as everyone can see that is just not so.  Not even the decency to call and let a person know what is going on, what they are doing to correct the problem or at least just to let me know they answer their phone msgs!  Guess I have to send this complaint to the BBB and Consumer Protection Agency for their review of this problem.  Hope everyone else got great service from these guys, just letting you know I have not after 10 days!!!

Review.Titre: Very good customer service over the…
Review.Contenu: Very good customer service over the phone quick and easy.Been 6 day since order hope I receive it soon as I am outof product.  Not sure when it should arrive.
great selection of hard to find quality merchandisevery reasonably priced outstanding customer service fast delivery will definitely use this again

If you're looking for restaurant equipment DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THE COMPANY BELOW. They sold me a split door freezer last year listed as "new" which was actually manufactured by True in 2005. The compressor went just two weeks ago. True only covers their compressors for 5 years and will not cover it because the unit is 12 years old. When delivered there was a USED sticker on the freezer and they still claimed it was new.  These folks are crooks.  There service manager is arrogant and rude and claims the unit was never even turned on and checked yet they still would not fix the compressor.   By the way....The Better Business Bureau has 11 complaints logged against this business!!!  Live & Learn.  Your reply below is a lie.  The unit was manufactured in 2005 according to True who said they would have honored the warranty on the compressor.  True stated you cannot sell a piece of their equipment that was manufactured 12 years prior as new, but you did.  Never been used huh, I guess that's why you guys slapped a USED sticker on the unit.  Regardless of your warranty True would have honored the compressor warranty so your argument is moot, and a lie.  You people are crooks!

I want to say that this review is solely based off of the customer service I have received from Mike Ellin, the Showroom Manager, since Justin Kennedy.I received a wall mount bracket that came with two plates but only one arm, in my mind this tells me I am missing an arm. I emailed Justin who I purchased it through and received no response. After a couple of weeks, Mike emailed me back saying that I only ordered one bracket and any others would have to be purchased. I asked follow-up questions, again thinking there should be two arms and received no response. I sent two more follow up emails with no response to Mike. I emailed the customer service email describing the service I received, funny enough it went to Mike. He did email me back, saying he did not see any order I have ever placed, nor does he have an account with my name on it. I have spent over $10,000 at ACD in the past year. I responded again with all of my information and have yet to received a response back, this was 5 days ago.Some of the salesmen may be great, but if they have to answer to this guy for any issues that come up I can promise you that you will not be taken care of as a customer. There are other options out there that want your business.

I bought, what was promoted as new, 2 Coldtech refrigeration units which were to have the factory warranties.  Now it is time to use the warranty and I find out from the company there never was a warranty attached with these units!  ACity had even listed these units touting the company's warranty as 'the best in the business with 3 years bumper to bumper'.  They NEVER indicated these were being sold without a warranty.  Even my invoice states these items as being 'NEW' not used or discontinued models.  My disgust with Acity stems from their REFUSAL to call me back or put someone on the line when I call who can help!  They will not even be respectful enough to return a phone call.  Coldtech execs were very upset to hear of these practices and have since contacted Acity.  I am sure this feedback will do little to make them call or uphold the warranty they advocated with the units.  I hate to go to the Consumer Protection Agency and BBB but maybe that is my only course of action here as everyone at ACity is in hiding.  Seems everyone has had a great experience with ACity, lets see if they change my mind a re-write a new feedbackOne Very upset customer.  Do not like being misled and then left holding the bag!

Review.Pseudo: Dwayne Fulbright Harry's Hideaway Bar & Grill
Review.Contenu: Went in to buy two dishwashers went thru with the sales man to make sure I got the right ones. we got it all figured out then I gave him my credit card he ran it thru and of course it went thru then he tells me after the fact that they have to do a verification that would take 10 min. of my time by charging a random amount to my credit card thats when it all started if you use keybank they do not post there charges for a day or so so I told him forget the order I would just buy it from webresaurant who are awesome bought many of things of greater value from so he told me he coulnt cancel the order Imaginge that so i asked to talk to a superviser told him to just cancel the order after talking to him for 10 min him trying to get me to convince me to not cancel the order he hung up on me. what great customer service the they called me again the next day hounded me about doing this verification mind you I have bought from them before without any problems just to get this whole experience over with it took almost an hour to do this I told him to be sure one of the owners or someone high up called me guess what not a call do yourself a big favor pass these guy by terrible and very unprofessional buy somewhere else. would give them negitive stars if I could

Review.Titre: Bought a used True two-door freezer for…
Review.Contenu: Bought a used True two-door freezer for about $2000.00 in October.  Didn't work at all when finally plugged in (mid November)  I did call "A City Discount" and left a message.  No reply.  Spent $894.29 on refrigeration repair (just got the bill now, hence the review).  It was made operational, but leaking water into freezer compartment.  Then this week, the kitchen filled with a burnt electric smell and it went dead again.  Parts are on now on order. I had ordered equipment from them before, so, as a return customer, was hoping to at least get a return call.  No such luck.  My advice: don't go for their used equipment. My repairman says that the unit clearly had been worked on before as it had cheap replacement parts (which were the latest parts to fail).  I should have bought new, but I was caught needing to meet a health inspector's demands at a time where funds were short.  Now I'm out $2,900 and waiting on the next bill-- and I'll still have the leak in the freezer compartment to deal with... and I'm pretty sure I'll continue having issues.For $3,800 I could have bought a True T-49F new with 3 years warranty on parts and labor, 5 years on the compressor.Don't throw your hard-earned money away on folks who won't even return your call.  You will regret it, like I am right now.
DO NOT TRUST OR DEAL WITH THIS SCAM COMPANY LEAD BY MARTY. THIEVES AND LIARS.

Review.Titre: worst customer service and don't trust their website
Review.Contenu: (Atlanta, GA.) I will never go back to that store. I called ahead and asked if they had continuous feed food processors in the showroom on display and the girl on the phone asked which brands and I told her and she said yes. So I drove 30 minutes to get there. When I walked in no one asked to help me so I asked where they would be. When I went to look there were none on display. On 2 brands in boxes, not on display and not one of the brand that I asked about. So I went back to the counter a 2nd time and had to interrupt a conversation between 2 employees to ask if there were any out in the store somewhere. The answer was no. So I went back to the shelf looking for the brand that I was interested in and could not see it. I looked on line and it said it was in stock (which I checked before driving so far).  So I went back to the counter a 3rd time and once again had to stop their conversation (between 2 employees) and ask if someone could help me. The girl asked what I needed, so I proceeded to ask about the appliance. She did not know what I was talking about so I showed her on my phone and that it was in stock but I could not see it anywhere. She looked it up and said it was online only. I asked her why it said "in stock" , she had no answer. And STILL no offered to go back to the shelf with me and take a look. I told her that I called before I came and drove 30 minutes to look at a product that was supposedly in stock. I was exasperated at the level of customer service and knowledge of their products. I just walked out. Don't expect any sort of help if you go to this store.Update after response 12/2/21I did not ask for a specific model. I wanted to see the brand which was not on the shelf and showed as "In stock" on your website, which I was told was not kept in the store and online only.  If it is not in the store it should not say "In stock". Its as simple as that.
Shipped promptly, and was just what I ordered
It should of been check beforehand
Great reasonable price for good products.

Review.Titre: Well I have not received my nugget ice…
Review.Contenu: Well I have not received my nugget ice machine no way of tracking it. It says it is still processing. I understand I placed the order on Saturday. But it Should have processed and shipped By now. My payment was processed quickly

Review.Titre: Need to impropve on customer service
Review.Contenu: The Customer service was not that great. I talked to the sales guy over the phone before actually visiting the place. When the sales representative came, he looked confused when I told him that we talked over the phone.

Review.Titre: Need an invoice for shipper tried call
Review.Contenu: Need an invoice for shipper tried call Larry no answer left messages as well, goods are still at the mailboat, kindly email invoices please to t let me know results2426011396
Even though the wrong rack arrived the team at ACityDiscount quickly ordered the correct one, arranged to have the first rack picked up and everything was handled correctly.

CS wanted my credit information a second time, after receiving it via website.  Claimed trying to verify my identity.  Tried to cancel order, since this was not in the terms and conditions and I am very protective of my credit rating.  CS was going to charge me for cancellation, even though their terms and conditions of sale did not require a second credit authorization.  After extensive back-and-forth, CS manager finally sent machine, but with caveat:  I had to personally inspect merchandise prior to signing for receipt, or I would be liable for any damage.  I don't know if they would do business with me again, even though this transaction ended up being proper, legal, and not fraudulent.  I could not do business with them again, at least via their website, because I am not sure they believe that I am who I say I am (in other words, they believed my sale to be a fraudulent transaction).

Review.Titre: Am new here so am just see what going…
Review.Contenu: Am new here so am just see what going to happen

I was not very happy with my experience. All the items were great, with the exception of one thing. If you are considering ordering a commercial hood here, don't! The sales staff do not have the required knowledge to help in markets across the country. I am in MN and my salesman sold me a hood that is illegal here. I would suggest using a local company, as they know the local codes, even if it costs a little more. The consumer should not be required to read all codes and know them. If there is a so called sales specialist, it should be their job to know the requirements. My other annoyance has to do with payment. If you are custom ordering something or getting custom pricing, then this is not the place for you. My salesman would email estimates, I would confirm the desire to order, then wouldn't hear anything! I guess it is my job to track down the salesman to buy something? Last I checked, when someone wants to give you money, you should be seeking them out. I felt like I was working to place my order, not acting as the consumer. Everything that is custom has to be ordered by phone, so this is where my issue was. I guess the entire process was just far too difficult. To really put the icing on the cake, my salesman would very rarely call me, or return a call. If I didn't call him, then nothing would happen. Even then, nothing happened. I would ask questions, but never get any actual feedback. Just frustrated I guess!  Stick to the standard stuff and you'll be just fine! Also, know what you are ordering, because the sales staff doesn't!

Review.Titre: I had problems with the ordering…
Review.Contenu: I had problems with the ordering process and customer service. The shipping was delayed and it took me a lot of time contacting customer support.

Review.Titre: Every thing is perfect but I…
Review.Contenu: Every thing is perfect but I recommended with 3 Star because I feel they recommended with 3 star.

Service was good but the quality of the product I purchased was poor.  I bought two Imperial Electric fryers and the repair company has been out twice in the past year to make repairs.  I reached out to Imperial and their hands were tied.  I wish their website had a place on the product page to put reviews.  I have had the identical problem with each fryer breaking down within days of one another.  Obviously there is an issue.

The item was found under bacon press but the real name was steak weights. My wife said they will work just as well. I found them to be a bit pricey and the order was right at 80.00  and we didn't get free shipping I first thought we would get free shipping  but it was on another order. All and all if your looking for kitchen type utensils this is the place for you.

Well we got the product, however there was a problem with Old Dominion shipping.  They had setup a time for delivery at between 2 and 4 pm on Friday.  When they had not arrived by 5 pm I called them.  They told me them that the cooler could not be delivered until Tuesday.  We had made arrangements with a moving company to help us at the original delivery range. We had to reschedule that for Tuesday.  This was very inconvenient and waisted several peoples time.

Love the sink, however, the packaging did not protect the product. When cutting the tape on the box to open it, the utility knife cut a horizontal scratch across the top of the sink compartments. To my surprise, there was no protective cardboard under the tape to prevent a knife from cutting into the sink when cutting thru the tape. I will try to buff out the cut in the top of the sink dividers with some steel wool or emery paper.Please improve your packaging!!!!

Review.Titre: Have not tried, but will ride to good health with healthy smoothies
Review.Contenu: I just opened the package.  Everything seemed fine but then the removable jar and base came apart.  I put it back together, but I'm not sure if it was correct because there were no directions for assembly.  I won't know until I have cleaned and sanitized the blender.  On the other hand, I received the product in a very timely manner. Tracking was very easy and efficient.

It was my first time coming to this store. Has many items, but it could use more employee's. If looking for used equipment they have a variety of options. I went three days in a row and each time I have to walk the whole store to get a sales or front desk to help me out. Unfortunately one of the items I purchased which is the sandwich prep cooler didn't work out. Besides that everything else was good and in working condition.

Review.Pseudo: Lee Stevens, 24/7 HVAC Service Co. NH
Review.Contenu: On the part of ACityDiscount, all was great. The shipping side of things needs some work so the product gets to the correct hub for delivery. This may not be a default of ACity, but in the shipping co-ordination. Product arrived with no damage during shipping, but unit was defective from the factory, and easily repaired on site. A defective unit comes from all different companies and does not reflect on ACityDiscount in my opinion.

Review.Titre: Service great but needed to communicate and never heard
Review.Contenu: Got my high quality product faster than promised, all was good there.  Web site stated at last minute that my ($3.00) item package would require a signature, so tried to contact to cancel.  Never heard back, but day I was gone all day, found the package on my front door with apparently no signature required ......

Review.Titre: Sale did not work as expected
Review.Contenu: We wanted a high temperature commercial dish washer.  High temperature is capable of raising 120 degree incoming water to at least 180 degrees for the rinse.  I did not read the spec sheet close enough and found that the machine I bought requires 140 degree incoming water to get the rinse up to 180 degrees.  There are cost penalties associated with running the hot water tank that high and also the risk of scalding someone washing there hands.  Other than that the lowest price was quoted on the first call.

Received Adcraft table in excellent condition, and you can see extra padding inside, so they take care of ensuring the table is not damaged. Without casters on the table, the price did seem higher than what I paid last year via another company. Overall satisfied.

Review.Titre: very helpful - but description a bit deceiving
Review.Contenu: Items shipped and arrived quicker than was originally told (was on back order), however on the purchase of the ice maker itself.. it was a bit deceiving as the ice bin shows on the picture but the there is only a small blurb about "Please note the Image shown may reflect a different configuration. Pictures are for reference only." - but it really should have said "Does not include storage bin".But the people we dealt with on the phones were great and helpful and did there best to get us the product as quick as possible.

Did not realize you do not bring the product in the business .I had to leave the cooler outside till the movers came the next day. It is still out on the landing till 4:00 this afternoon .Have not opened the package till It is inside.However the delivery man was most helpful.

Ordering was easy, fast delivery and communication on item being shipped.  The one negative is when I emailed them to ask if a hose could be connected to the drain the inside sales rep responded by saying he/she was not a plumber but they supposed I could ask one.

Review.Titre: We have ordered on two separate …
Review.Contenu: We have ordered on two separate occasions through ACity.  Both times our stainless steel mop sinks have come damaged, so we have had to bend them back into original shape.  Fedex, the delivery service, did not let us open the box to check for damage first, they said that was not their company policy.  They said if it wasn't signed for, that it was their property and they would have to take it with them.  So, whose responsibility is it? ACity or Fedex?  Either way, I have somewhat damaged sinks that are now my property and my responsibility, yet not in the condition in which I ordered them.

Review.Titre: Good but could be better on service
Review.Contenu: Was helped to a great extent, would patronize again, spent close to few hundred, but sales person didn't close deal with me I left and went to REM and spent over 10 times that much an hour later. Could spent that with you guys.

The online order form was giving me trouble so I called. Within 10 minutes, everything was straightened out and finalized for shipping. My only complaint was the high shipping cost. It was almost as much as the product.

The purchase experience was all positive and the sales staff were superb.  One item was to be picked-up later, a refrigeration unit.  Sales staff noted that there would be contacts encouraging pick-up after one and two weeks.  No problem.  But the reality was that multiple contacts were made by both sales staff and management, with the management contacts bordering on hostile and threatening.  The item was finally picked-up but guys, chill out.  When you start treating your customers like car salesmen do with high-pressure tactics and threats just to try and sell a delivery after you've already been paid, you may drive them away to your competitors.  In fact you already have in at least one instance.

Review.Titre: good prices but sales rep very hard to get a hold of
Review.Contenu: Came in with my wife looking for a preo table.  Raffled to Mike I guess the show room manager,  very nice and knowledgeable, shored us what he had and we told him we would be in contact when we could set up a delivery time. Well we tried to reach him for the next 3 days we were told he was bz and he would be told we called or transfered to his voice mail,  which I left 3 messages letting home know we wanted to buy and needed delivered asap. On 3rd day I talked to jon and told him I need to buy this prep table ASAP and if Mike won't call me back I'm going somewhere else so Jon took my order but I had to argue about the discount Mike had promised finally got the price and item delivered.  Otherwise would have given 5 stars

Review.Titre: Our order was messed up on your end
Review.Contenu: Our order was messed up on your end. After a couple phone calls the problum was cleared up and we got all of our order. Thank you for making it right.         Doc Waldie
The service was great for the purchase of my ice machine but I didn't receive it as promised. It was promised for delivery by Thurs. or Fri. but I didn't receive it until Monday.

Review.Titre: Some kinks, but it was resolved in a fair manner
Review.Contenu: The assistance that I received in the store was great.  I also felt that I was able to find the right product for the right price.  However, my purchase was damaged upon delivery and it was difficult to come to a reasonable agreement on making this right.  Good customer service can make or break a business.  Upon delivery, I called customer service to discuss the damage to my product and was placed on hold for well over 20 minutes.  Once I was able to speak with a customer service representative, the issues was still left unresolved.  Once I was given an offer to compensate for the damages, it was unacceptable.  When a customer has an issue that is not of their own doing, the company should take care of the issue as quickly and fairly as possible.  In the end, I was able to resolve the problem in a fair manner.

Review.Titre: The piece of equipment was delivered…
Review.Contenu: The piece of equipment was delivered without notice during lunch. Because the parking lot was full during the lunch period the 265 lb grill was left across the parking lot.

Review.Titre: Upset that they came after me for sales tax
Review.Contenu: I'm upset that you guys came after me for sales tax after the sale was complete.   Not an honest way to do business.  Should have on the ebay listing and during checkout.

Review.Titre: Delivered as advertised, but no shipping options or information.
Review.Contenu: It was easy enough to find what I was looking for and order. However, there were no shipping options. I had no idea how long it would take until after I placed my order.

Review.Titre: I'll let you know once I receive it all....
Review.Contenu: Along with the tables you had in Atlanta we ordered chairs that aren't scheduled to ship until 3/6/13 and stools until 3/11/13!!! What's up with the delay?

Review.Titre: good prices over all with good response times
Review.Contenu: Over all good prices, customer service could be better. When salesman tells you something and then dont never do it, it gets old. but over all good review.

Review.Titre: It would be great if the photos of the item matched the item…
Review.Contenu: It would be great if the photos of the item were the actual photos or the description were not so generic.  Only two baskets came versus the four it shows in the picture.  We were lucky we had one more basket to mostly fit in there on hand.  We were also lucky to have had dividers from our previous ice cream freezer or we would have had a big mess of novelty ice cream products just heaped together in the baskets.  These freezers should come with the parts needed to display ice cream neatly.  My previous freezer had four baskets with each divided into 3 compartments with extra storage below.  I'm now down to three baskets with reclaimed dividers and no room for a 4th basket and no storage space there to fill.  This cuts down on my organization and ability to carry the same product.  The old dead freezer and the new freezer have the same dimensions.  The sale went well, the freezer was delivered right on time, and it seems to be working well, so far.
First time I shop on the this website. I am very love it because they are convenient and easy to get in, and looking for some item.

Review.Titre: good price but not on time delivery
Review.Contenu: very good price friendly sales person good product but my delivery was one week late than promise date but its ok not that bad.
Long delay in delivery. Three days from GA to AZ, six days from Phoenix to Sedona, 120 milesVery costly for my business

Review.Titre: Shipper wouldn't bring it to the proper location
Review.Contenu: The delivery man just dumped it at the front of our restaurant although we asked to have it brought to the store room.
they have great prices and selection, however, their communication on shipping time frames and details need work.
I had one the same size but shaped differently. The top is a joke. But the one I have will work on this one.
I ordered the wrong size. I can still use them, description should have dimensions though
product and cost were the reasons for purchasing here but dont be in a hurry! 2 weeks for me, wow!

Review.Titre: Dealing with ACityDiscount rep Adam was…
Review.Contenu: Dealing with ACityDiscount rep Adam was fine. But we had trouble dealing with UPS. We followed the tracking directions - called the number provided - and got a rep who was clueless. We gave her all the relevant information and she said the order did not exist. Yet we had been told it had been shipped and we should call this number. After more than one call with both my husband and I talking to the UPS person she finally realized that we had been given the wrong number. The number we needed was UPS Freight. The ship was promised for 2 different times, then delayed. The trucker who finally delivered the steel table and sink was very good to deal with, fortunately, after the previous aggravation. He offered to open the box when I said I wanted to inspect the merchandise and waited patiently while I looked it over to be sure there was no visible damage and that a table, 4 legs, sink, and faucets were included. I highly recommend you contact UPS and be sure reps know that to immediately put the customer in contact with UPS Freight rather than regular UPS if it is a large package. Better yet, have that information included in emails from ACity Discount. The frustration we experienced could have been completely avoided with better communication.

Review.Titre: This was my first time dealing with…
Review.Contenu: This was my first time dealing with this company and so far I don't have any complaints
Price was excellent & delivery time was good. My product was damaged during delivery.

Review.Titre: Great but no notice of delivery
Review.Contenu: Item came quickly but was left in the street with no one letting us know it was there
Exactly what I order, good product. Did not receive tracking information to my email.
used food warmer...could have been cleaned better.  Still had lime deposits inside.
Would be better if the salesperson would answer the phone when customer calls.

Review.Titre: the refrigerator was not the same as showing in the photo and had a dent
Too many Delays on A-City Doscounts part
Review.Contenu: Ordering took days due to your people getting one anothers approval

Review.Titre: It was quite the challenge in the…
Review.Contenu: It was quite the challenge in the beginning of the transaction.

Review.Titre: Need a better pricing system...No price …
Review.Contenu: Need a better pricing system...No price on products in store...

Review.Titre: I received exactly what I had ordered …
Review.Contenu: I received exactly what I had ordered with prompt shipping.

Review.Titre: Driver did not have hand truck upon…
Review.Contenu: Driver did not have hand truck upon delivery.
I think is the best of all time favorite sites
Up to date equipment and reasonably priced.

Review.Titre: ACityDiscount has great prices and…good customer service
Review.Contenu: ACityDiscount has great prices and their service was very efficient and professional. Received a phone call telling me when I should expect delivery and an e-mail to track package if necessary. Delivery carrier called the morning of delivery to insure someone would be home to accept package. Stainless sink arrived in good condition (well packaged on a pallet). Would buy from this merchant again ..
The staff is good,they are willing and patient assisting the costumer.the gadget is affordable and 100 percent legit.try your own and you will believe in me.
They die not have the items I needed in stock and were not expected before another 6 weeks or so. The supply chain issue so not their fault. The sales person was helpful and patient with me.

Review.Titre: I recently purchased a dishwasher from…
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased a dishwasher from ACityDiscount, and I was very impressed with their service. The staff were knowledgeable and helped me choose a model that fit my needs and budget perfectly. The delivery process was smooth and efficient, and the installation team did a great job setting up the dishwasher and making sure everything was working properly before they left. Overall, I had a great experience with this company, and I would definitely recommend them to anyone in the market for a new dishwasher or other home appliances.

Review.Contenu: Placed order online and it was delivered in a timely manner. I did have questions while shopping online and logged in to chat and was never answered.

Review.Contenu: A city Discount is awesome I just didn't like the person  that waited on me. Service was great delivery was awesome
Ordering was easy and efficient Shipping was not so good. The package was not delivered when they said it would be. Two days later

ACityDiscount is a great site. This is a very nice place to buy cheap products! I love it! The prices are amazing, and I can get my product within a few days. This is the best site for me to get things like this because I don't have time to go shopping or visit stores. They have everything I need at an affordable price.
Easy to purchase product. ACityDiscount shipped out product timely. Item arrived as advertised.
Really contented with the furniture. Very helpful staff reasonable prices & good quality.

Review.Titre: Georgia peach plumbing is my hero
Review.Contenu: Georgia peach plumbing is my hero love Noah
goods delivered before promised. Fair pricing.

Review.Titre: I have not received my purchase
Review.Contenu: I have not received my purchase, as of yet.  I see that it was shipped USPS, so I am expecting it any day now.  I saw what appeared to be a tracking number, but the site did not have the tracking number set up as a link to track my items.  Other than that, I was very satisfied with my purchase.  Again, I have not received the package to see the condition of the items that I purchased.

Review.Titre: Need to change the prices on the display boxes to match the computer prices
Review.Contenu: Buy the knifes set but was priced $150 and they charge me$175 .i ask they why and say the price was change on the computer but not on the display box so they still charge me $175 even if i show them the box was marked $150

Review.Titre: Our buying experience was amazing but delivery was not
Review.Contenu: Our buying experience was amazing and the oven is perfect. The only issue we had was with the delivery : the oven was unexpectedly delivered. We had received no tracking number, and no appointment taken (despite clear instructions on the packing slip) and the +100lb package was left in full sun on the parking lot, not even close to our door. We actually received a shipment email and tracking number 1 week later...

Good selections of electronics available at very reasonable cost. Premium quality products. Offers amazing deals and discounts on every product which we bought from their site. Happy with the quick shipping process and attentive customer support service. Satisfied with my purchase.

Acitydiscount provides one on one consultation catered to the clients needs.You may have to call a few times but they will give you advise in the right direction. They also will provide written quotes.They also ship direct to wherever you are in the U.S so don't worry if you are not located near them.

Review.Titre: All the staff I spoke with were polite…
Review.Contenu: All the staff I spoke with were polite and helpful when I was trying to complete the order and payment. We are a Church that utilizes out kitchen for a weekly community dinner, other meals on weekends and a Thanksgiving community meal so we needed the refrigerator ASAP. You had my order ready to deliver in less than a week.  We will be doing business with you again soon. Thank you, Barbara Smith, Willow Praise Church

I did my homework before purchasing so I didn’t need a lot of help.  The shipping company seemed to have the unit a long time before scheduling delivery after I was told it was out for delivery.  I was asked to do a review 4 days before receiving the cooler.  The unit itself is well built, looks and operates good so far, and was purchased at a very fair price.

Review.Titre: Shipment was fast, UPS abused the shipping carton.
Review.Contenu: No problems with their service as the shipment went out the next day after purchasing online. The only issue I had was with UPS abusing the microwave carton by apparently dropping it at least once and puncturing the box in three places.  It’s a miracle the microwave arrived unscathed and functions well. I would highly recommend ACD shipping department place FRAGILE stickers on these shipments to at least hope someone with UPS will take care in S&H.

Review.Titre: This store surprized by the assortment of furniture here.
Review.Contenu: In my opinion, it's very important for human to find the time in their tight schedule in order to dedicate it to household chores. That's why I once have decided to start finding a proper store to decorate my room with new stuff and replace the old furniture with a new one. This store surprized by the assortment of furniture here. You can easily find the most suitable option of couch for example and you won't actually spend too much time on it. This is the main feature, that everything goes very fast here. Customer support is on a solid level, mostly because they are very responsive and I guess quite responsible.

Excellent. Would rate five stars if the product would have been packed with more protection. The legs came loose and dented the product in transit. Not major enough damage to endure the hassle of refusal, return and replacement, but nevertheless a disappointment. Repairable damage. Happy with the product and the buying experience otherwise, especially followup and perceived concern about the buying experience.

Review.Titre: The merchandise was delivered on time …
Review.Contenu: The merchandise was delivered on time but was severely damaged. The driver took it back and I contacted the merchant to replace or refund. The merchant promptly sought for a replacement unit and secured one and shipped it as soon as they could. The kitchen project was delayed a little but overall the merchant did good job following up with the customer. I will recommend the merchant to others for their after service.,

Review.Titre: I had a great experience buying my …
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience buying my convection stove eye . Salesmen told me you could use any cookware on it . On outside of box when I received it , it says you have to use certain kind of cookware . Could you clear that up for me ? I haven’t opened it yet to read about it in case I decide to return it . I certainly hope I don’t . Thank you !!!!👍👍

This single transaction worked out fine. I got a email when it was shipped and the item has been delivered in good shape.   I also ordered a much more expensive item from them the same day on a separate order-----(Ice Machine) but so far have not gotten a email as to whether the second order has shipped yet or not, or when it is expected to arrive.

Overall I was pleased with my purchase of the turbo air refrigeratorAdam was very helpful in helping me select the right unitthe reversing of the door was quite involved-much harder than I expectednot your problem turbo airIt's been running since last Thursday(19th)We are experiencing an issue with door sensors-found out this is ajust released new model--It's having some issuesHaving to replace the control panel unitall covered by warranty

Appears to be a good quality product. Packaging was very poor with absolutely no padding between the box and the product. Miraculously, there was only very slight damage during shipping. The seller advised me in advance to check the product before accepting; I expect the poor packaging has been a problem for them before.  Any heavy metal object should be packaged better than this before it is given to truckers and package handlers to toss around. Overall I am very pleased with the product.

Everything was prompt and quick. My only issue is the lack of clarity on the website about returns. There needs to be a clear tab or option that details how to get into contact with the returns process. (To note, return not needed because of ACityDiscount) But everything else was as expected and delivered correctly the first time.

Review.Titre: Overall very good service and quick to…
Review.Contenu: Overall very good service and quick to answers questions. I also appreciated the email confirming the power supply thing.The only point of improvement I would add to that is featuring pictures of the plug. While we had a three phase set up with 50 amps the plug was slightly different which delayed us a bit.

Review.Titre: Pros (and cons I think I can live with)
Review.Contenu: I didn't expect the shipment to arrive so quickly.  The price was 2/3 of what I would have paid to Vitamix for this particular blender carafe.  I only wish that I had received the exact model shown on the online page, which had the original rubber ergonomic handle--as opposed to this thin plastic one; also, the lid jiggles around as if it will fall off when I'm blending.  The original lid has a special lip that secures the seal.  I will see if my original lid will fit the new carafe.

The seats were perfect for replacing our two old chairs and they arrived very quickly.  I would give 5 stars, but one seat has a tiny vertical stress tear (1 inch) in the very front.  We don't care enough to send it back, but maybe it snuck past quality control.  Or perhaps it tore during shipment?

I would give 5 stars, except for the delivery information.  One appliance was coming by Fedex and because I set it to go to my business address, there is no way to get notified as to when it might arrive. The only information I was given is that it could arrive between 8:00am & 8:00 pm.  For the other, the tracking number wasn’t identified, on the invoice, and I had to contact the shipping company to get an idea as to when it would arrive. Being that I am in a rural area, deliveries take longer than usual.  Still waiting on the oven to arrive.

Review.Titre: Ice machine arrived with a dent in the…
Review.Contenu: Ice machine arrived with a dent in the side. Shipping box wasn't damaged, so it was boxed that way from the manufacturer. Wasn't a big deal for me as the machine is under my island and the dent isn't in view. Everything about the purchase went smooth and item arrived promptly.

Excellent customer support service provided by ACityDiscount. Bought one Electric 6 Burner Restaurant Range with Standard oven which can be used for commercial as well as house purpose. Liked the quality of the product very much.

First, I paid $50 to have it brought into the house.  That did not occur.Second, the condenser is loud.  Is that common with this model.  I did not have this issue with the previous ice maker.  Any idea why it is so loud???

Review.Titre: The experience in placing and receiving …
Review.Contenu: The experience in placing and receiving my order was very easy and I received what I ordered in a timely manner. There was no shipping damage to the equipment which means that it was packaged well and the shipping company that delivered it took care in handling it.

Normally would be five stars.  Product and shipping are still good quality and fast.  Packaging this time was in a much larger box, had some concern about product integrity, but appears to be in good shape.

Review.Titre: The ice machine I ordered took a little …
Review.Contenu: The ice machine I ordered took a little longer to get to me than originally discussed but my salesman, Ned followed up as best he could, I think the issue was with whom the distributor was for this particular machine. Good prices and good communication.

Review.Titre: I am very satisfied with the speed of …
Review.Contenu: I am very satisfied with the speed of the delivery, but the driver failed to give me a call even though it was stated on the slip. I was called from another site, by the time I arrive in 20min, the driver was gone after dropping off the equipment.

Review.Titre: Delivery from purchase to front door…
Review.Contenu: Delivery from purchase to front door was wonderful. However the product itself is in question. The cooler doesnt seem to be cold enough and it's been on for 3 days now. Gonna give a little more time and see what happens.

Review.Titre: The thermostat Control is in the way of…
Review.Contenu: The thermostat Control is in the way of installing the legs on Deep fryer have to remove thermostat control in order to secure them too unit ...... Have not used fryers yet we'll get back with you on how they function at a later date.

Review.Titre: The product ordered is as advertised…
Review.Contenu: The product ordered is as advertised and was delivered in a timely manner. The shipping box was damaged and noted as such by the USPS and the item was not damaged. However, the shipping charge was excessive.

The item was good, only problem in shipping, ups had to have me sign for the package, I missed them 3 times and had to drive 20 miles to pick it up at the ups hub. Don"t know why  I had to sign for a 20 dollar item.
They arrived before the expected date and were exactly what was needed.  Thank you for your assistance.  I liked that I could buy them as individual pieces instead of packs of 12.

Well, ACity finally came through.  They covered the service call and gave a little extra for the inconvenience.  They did have to fight with the manufacturer like I did but guess they had more leverage and won out.  Got the check today.  Bad thing is, the other unit I bought from them (same manufacturer) now went down. Must be something about getting close to end of warranty. They said it should be no problem reimbursing me this time as they straightened things out with the manufacturer. I would have gone to 5 stars but with all the initial problems, no call backs etc I went with 4 due to their fighting for me with the manufacturer.  I'd buy from them again but will ask more questions also. Just good business practices.

Review.Titre: This message is to the freight company you used for my delivery...
Review.Contenu: Every person I talked to was very helpful and pleasant to deal with.  Your people are customer service oriented.  The one think I didn't liked is that the freight company you used from GA to RI, never bothered to give you the delivery date of my purchase.  I actually called to cancel the order and was put on hold, then the sales rep told me that the item was already in transit.  Had I known, I could've pass that info along to my client who was nervous about not having his item on time.  I also spent some time looking for an alternative.  I think the freight company you hired could have done a better job.  I thought of letting you know to see if you'll pass my message along to them.  Maybe they need some feedback.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: Thank you for your help and please be…
Review.Contenu: Thank you for your help and please be sure to send me a catalog.  I didn't like your website its not easy to navigate.

Third appliance purchased from ACityDiscount and everything has been 5 star worthy until this last delivery (first time fedex was the carrier). I had requested a call be made before delivery and provided a cell phone plus backup landline. After never getting a call on either and seeing the status change from delivery on Thursday to pending, I decided to call fedex. After a 20 minutes of transferring to different departments I was told that someone did call and when I disputed this was promptly hung up on. I went and got phone records from my cell provider after this, and those proved to me there never was a call. Back to calling fedex and twenty more minutes of shuffling around and I get a supervisor and the best they can do is 5 days later even though the shipping center where the item is is within 15 miles of the destination. The shipping portion of this particular order was incredibly frustrating, and completely unlike the previous orders from AcityDiscount.com. Removing fedex from the equation would bring this rating back up to 5 stars

Fantastic service from support staff and others in the mix to get my slicer to me QUICK! I appreciate it! Also, customer service assisted me in picking out the perfect product for my business.
No hassle with the purchase. Delivery was the same day as payment. A very nice surprise. Overall experience was very positive. The delivery guys were friendly and helpful.

5 decades experience is authentic  indeed wit Acitydiscount It was never a waste of my money shopping with u, I always admire my kitchen utensils , kettle, cooker ,etc anytime I enter my kitchen It’s still new as if it was shopped just yesterday All thanks to you Great deals ; great discount!

Review.Titre: You were quick on sending out my order right on time
Review.Contenu: You were quick on sending out my order
Staff was helpful and got a great price on a used eye/ handwash combo sink.
No hassle with the purchase.  Delivery was the same day as payment.  A very nice surprise. Overall experience was very positive.  The delivery guys were friendly and helpful.

There are tons of different furniture and equipment, and, actually, I applied for services to this company when I made a slight renovation of my kitchen. The assortment stunned me for real, and I found a paning grill of a high quality. Couple of tasty paninis were already done! Now I know where to order stuff quickly and free of any hustle.
Having the part available online and free shipping was great. The local retail store was out of stock and 2X the cost.

Overall great experience. I called to make sure the online order went through correctly. The representative made sure the order was placed correctly, helped me add on an additional shipping service, and sent a tracking number as soon as it was available. The product we order was exactly what we wanted. Highly recommend!

Fellow that I spoke with on the phone did an awesome job asking me questions and helping me determine what I needed.  We had a little bit of trouble when my wife picked up the machine since I purchased it and she was picking it up but they worked through it with us and we were able to pick it up.

Customer service was almost better than our best wine! Shopping online then calling to getting a Real Person (Alex) to help me with my decisions.  Followed up by a call from the manager to make sure everything was good.  THEN, my shipment showed up in 2 days!!

I worked with Larry, who laid out the pricing, including some delivery options, and clearly described the process. Once I placed the order, I was kept informed of the timing of the delivery. The unit was delivered on the day that Larry said it would, and the gentlemen that delivered the unit, and removed the old one were very professional, and fully met our expectations. The whole process was smooth, and professional.

Brian Bennett was just great, and my guy came and picked it right up. They were actually the same price as a big online retailer that we usually order from, which is really great since we could go by and pick up the kitchen equipment

The rep we used for help, was super knowledgable and got us product and delivered when he said it would be. We are from Tucson, AZ we will be using this company again for more product when needed. Thank you
Everyone was friendly and helpful.  A salesperson walked me to the item I was looking for and purchased.
